input.subject: input.subject.name
The current user: The current user name, translated from claimsPrincipal.Identity.Name

input.subject: input.subject.claims[]
The current user: An array of the current user claims

input.subject: input.subject.claims[_].type
The current user: The type that the claim is, for example "role".

input.subject: input.subject.isAuthenticated
The current user: Is the current user authenticated or not.

input.subject: input.operation
The current user: The operation name set when configuring the policy.

input.subject: input.request
The current user: Contains an object with information of the current http request

input.subject: input.request.path[]
The current user: Contains an array of the url path which is split by '/', example: "test/testing" becomes ["test", "testing"]

input.subject: input.request.routeValues[]
The current user: A key value set that contains routing values

input.subject: input.request.query[]
The current user: A key value set that contains query variables in the url.

input.subject: input.request.method
The current user: The http method used in the request, GET, POST, etc.

input.subject: input.resource
The current user: On single resource authorization, this contains the resource that is being authorized.
